duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee the financial operations of a manufacturing plant, collaborating closely with the plant manager to drive financial health and efficiency.
Utilize business data to inform operational decisions, with a focus on improving profitability, reducing waste, and driving efficiency.
Close monthly, quarterly, and annual books, with a primary focus on enhancing the financial health of the business.
Utilize expertise in ERP inventory management to optimize operations and drive financial improvement.
Utilize financial expertise to contribute to the strategic financial decision-making process, including the improvement of plant revenue and financial operations.
No direct reports for this role at this time.

education_certification.credential: CFO or Controller experience with Manufacturing experience. Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field (Master's preferred)
